00010 void SISO::gen_chtrellis(void)
00011 // generate trellis for precoded FIR channels with real coefficients
00012 {
00013     //get parameters
00014     int mem_len = impulse_response.cols()-1;//memory length of the channel
00015     int p_order = prec_gen.length()-1;//order of the precoder polynomial
00016 
00017     //other variables
00018     register int n,k,j;
00019     double inputs[] = {1.0,-1.0};//1->-1, 0->+1
00020     int index;
00021     double feedback[2];
00022 
00023     //create channel trellis
00024     int equiv_ch_mem_len = std::max(mem_len, p_order);
00025     chtrellis.stateNb = (1<<equiv_ch_mem_len);
00026     chtrellis.output = new double[2*chtrellis.stateNb];
00027     chtrellis.nextState = new int[2*chtrellis.stateNb];
00028     chtrellis.prevState = new int[2*chtrellis.stateNb];
00029     chtrellis.input = new int[2*chtrellis.stateNb];
00030 
00031     //initialize trellis
00032     itpp::ivec enc_mem(equiv_ch_mem_len);
00033 #pragma omp parallel for private(n,enc_mem,k,feedback,j)
00034     for (n=0;n<chtrellis.stateNb;n++) //initial state
00035     {
00036         enc_mem = 1-2*itpp::to_ivec(itpp::dec2bin(equiv_ch_mem_len, n));//1->-1, 0->+1
00037         //output
00038         for (k=0;k<2;k++)
00039         {
00040             feedback[k] = inputs[k];
00041             for (j=1;j<=p_order;j++)
00042                 if (prec_gen[j])
00043                     feedback[k] *= enc_mem[j-1];//xor truth table must remain the same
00044             chtrellis.output[n+k*chtrellis.stateNb] = feedback[k]*impulse_response(0,0);
00045             for (j=1;j<=mem_len;j++)
00046                 chtrellis.output[n+k*chtrellis.stateNb] += (enc_mem[j-1]*impulse_response(0,j));
00047         }
00048         //next state
00049         for (j=(equiv_ch_mem_len-1);j>0;j--)
00050             enc_mem[j] = enc_mem[j-1];
00051         for (k=0;k<2;k++)
00052         {
00053             enc_mem[0] = int(feedback[k]);
00054             chtrellis.nextState[n+k*chtrellis.stateNb] = itpp::bin2dec(itpp::to_bvec((1-enc_mem)/2), true);//-1->1, +1->0
00055         }
00056     }
00057 
00058 #pragma omp parallel for private(j,index,n,k)
00059     for (j=0;j<chtrellis.stateNb;j++)
00060     {
00061         index = 0;
00062         for (n=0;n<chtrellis.stateNb;n++)
00063         {
00064             for (k=0;k<2;k++)
00065             {
00066                 if (chtrellis.nextState[n+k*chtrellis.stateNb]==j)
00067                 {
00068                     chtrellis.prevState[j+index*chtrellis.stateNb] = n;
00069                     chtrellis.input[j+index*chtrellis.stateNb] = k;//this is an index to the channel input
00070                     index++;
00071                 }
00072             }
00073         }
00074     }
00075 }
00076 
00077 void SISO::equalizer_logMAP(itpp::vec &extrinsic_data, const itpp::vec &rec_sig, const itpp::vec &apriori_data)
00078 /*
00079   extrinsic_data - extrinsic information of channel input symbols
00080   rec_sig - received symbols
00081   apriori_data - a priori information of channel input symbols
00082  */
00083 {
00084     //get parameters
00085     int N = rec_sig.length();//length of the received frame
00086     //other parameters
00087     register int n,k,m;
00088     int pstates[2];
00089     int nstates[2];
00090     int inputs[2];
00091     double C[2];//log(gamma)
00092     double sum;
00093     double sumbis;
00094     double buffer;
00095 
00096     //initialize trellis
00097     gen_chtrellis();
00098     //initialize log(alpha) and log(beta)
00099     double* A = new double[chtrellis.stateNb*(N+1)];
00100     double* B = new double[chtrellis.stateNb*(N+1)];
00101     A[0] = 0;
00102     B[N*chtrellis.stateNb] = 0;
00103     sum = (tail?-INFINITY:0);
00104 #pragma omp parallel for private(n)
00105     for (n=1;n<chtrellis.stateNb;n++)
00106     {
00107         A[n] = -INFINITY;
00108         B[n+N*chtrellis.stateNb] = sum;//if tail==false the final state is not known
00109     }
00110 
00111 #pragma omp parallel sections private(n,sum,m,k,C)
00112 {
00113     //forward recursion
00114     for (n=1;n<=N;n++)
00115     {
00116         sum = 0;//normalisation factor
00117         for (m=0;m<chtrellis.stateNb;m++) //final state
00118         {
00119             for (k=0;k<2;k++)
00120             {
00121                 pstates[k] = chtrellis.prevState[m+chtrellis.stateNb*k];//determine previous states
00122                 inputs[k] = chtrellis.input[m+chtrellis.stateNb*k];//determine input
00123                 C[k] = (inputs[k])*apriori_data[n-1]-itpp::sqr(rec_sig[n-1]-chtrellis.output[pstates[k]+chtrellis.stateNb*inputs[k]])/(2*sigma2);//compute log of gamma
00124             }
00125             A[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb] = itpp::log_add(A[pstates[0]+(n-1)*chtrellis.stateNb]+C[0], A[pstates[1]+(n-1)*chtrellis.stateNb]+C[1]);
00126             sum += exp(A[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb]);
00127         }
00128         //normalisation
00129         sum = log(sum);
00130         for (m=0;m<chtrellis.stateNb;m++)
00131         {
00132             A[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb] -= sum;
00133         }
00134     }
00135 
00136     //backward recursion
00137 #pragma omp section
00138     for (n=N-1;n>=0;n--)
00139     {
00140         sum = 0;//normalisation factor
00141         for (m=0;m<chtrellis.stateNb;m++) //initial state
00142         {
00143             for (k=0;k<2;k++)
00144             {
00145                 nstates[k] = chtrellis.nextState[m+k*chtrellis.stateNb];//determine next states
00146                 C[k] = (k)*apriori_data[n]-itpp::sqr(rec_sig[n]-chtrellis.output[m+k*chtrellis.stateNb])/(2*sigma2);//compute log of gamma
00147             }
00148             B[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb] = itpp::log_add(B[nstates[0]+(n+1)*chtrellis.stateNb]+C[0], B[nstates[1]+(n+1)*chtrellis.stateNb]+C[1]);
00149             sum += exp(B[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb]);
00150         }
00151         //normalisation
00152         sum = log(sum);
00153         for (m=0;m<chtrellis.stateNb;m++)
00154         {
00155             B[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb] -= sum;
00156         }
00157     }
00158 }
00159 
00160     //compute extrinsic_data
00161     extrinsic_data.set_size(N);
00162 #pragma omp parallel for private(n,sum,sumbis,m,k,nstates,C,buffer)
00163     for (n=1;n<=N;n++)
00164     {
00165         sum = 0;//could be replaced by a vector
00166         sumbis = 0;
00167         for (m=0;m<chtrellis.stateNb;m++) //initial state
00168         {
00169             for (k=0;k<2;k++) //input index
00170             {
00171                 nstates[k] = chtrellis.nextState[m+k*chtrellis.stateNb];//determine next states
00172                 C[k] = (k)*apriori_data[n-1]-itpp::sqr(rec_sig[n-1]-chtrellis.output[m+k*chtrellis.stateNb])/(2*sigma2);//compute log of gamma
00173                 buffer = exp(A[m+(n-1)*chtrellis.stateNb]+C[k]+B[nstates[k]+n*chtrellis.stateNb]);
00174                 if (k)
00175                     sum += buffer;//1
00176                 else
00177                     sumbis += buffer;//0
00178             }
00179         }
00180         extrinsic_data[n-1] = log(sum/sumbis)-apriori_data[n-1];
00181     }
00182 
00183     //free memory
00184     delete[] chtrellis.output;
00185     delete[] chtrellis.nextState;
00186     delete[] chtrellis.prevState;
00187     delete[] chtrellis.input;
00188     delete[] A;
00189     delete[] B;
00190 }
00191 
00192 void SISO::equalizer_maxlogMAP(itpp::vec &extrinsic_data, const itpp::vec &rec_sig, const itpp::vec &apriori_data)
00193 /*
00194   extrinsic_data - extrinsic information for channel input symbols
00195   rec_sig - received symbols
00196   apriori_data - a priori information for channel input symbols
00197  */
00198 {
00199     //get parameters
00200     int N = rec_sig.length();//length of the received frame
00201     //other parameters
00202     register int n,k,m;
00203     int pstates[2];
00204     int nstates[2];
00205     int inputs[2];
00206     double C[2];//log(gamma)
00207     double sum;
00208     double sumbis;
00209     double buffer;
00210 
00211     //initialize trellis
00212     gen_chtrellis();
00213     //initialize log(alpha) and log(beta)
00214     double* A = new double[chtrellis.stateNb*(N+1)];
00215     double* B = new double[chtrellis.stateNb*(N+1)];
00216     A[0] = 0;
00217     for (n=1;n<chtrellis.stateNb;n++)
00218         A[n] = -INFINITY;
00219     B[N*chtrellis.stateNb] = 0;
00220     sum = (tail?-INFINITY:0);
00221     for (n=1;n<chtrellis.stateNb;n++)
00222         B[n+N*chtrellis.stateNb] = sum;//if tail==false the final state is not known
00223 
00224 #pragma omp parallel sections private(n,sum,m,k,C)
00225 {
00226     //forward recursion
00227     for (n=1;n<=N;n++)
00228     {
00229         sum = -INFINITY;//normalization factor
00230         for (m=0;m<chtrellis.stateNb;m++) //final state
00231         {
00232             for (k=0;k<2;k++)
00233             {
00234                 pstates[k] = chtrellis.prevState[m+chtrellis.stateNb*k];//determine previous states
00235                 inputs[k] = chtrellis.input[m+chtrellis.stateNb*k];//determine input
00236                 C[k] = (inputs[k])*apriori_data[n-1]-itpp::sqr(rec_sig[n-1]-chtrellis.output[pstates[k]+chtrellis.stateNb*inputs[k]])/(2*sigma2);//compute log of gamma
00237             }
00238             A[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb] = std::max(A[pstates[0]+(n-1)*chtrellis.stateNb]+C[0], A[pstates[1]+(n-1)*chtrellis.stateNb]+C[1]);
00239             sum = std::max(sum, A[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb]);
00240         }
00241         for (m=0;m<chtrellis.stateNb;m++)
00242             A[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb] -= sum;
00243     }
00244 
00245     //backward recursion
00246 #pragma omp section
00247     for (n=N-1;n>=0;n--)
00248     {
00249         sum = -INFINITY;//normalisation factor
00250         for (m=0;m<chtrellis.stateNb;m++) //initial state
00251         {
00252             for (k=0;k<2;k++)
00253             {
00254                 nstates[k] = chtrellis.nextState[m+k*chtrellis.stateNb];//determine next states
00255                 C[k] = (k)*apriori_data[n]-itpp::sqr(rec_sig[n]-chtrellis.output[m+k*chtrellis.stateNb])/(2*sigma2);//compute log of gamma
00256             }
00257             B[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb] = std::max(B[nstates[0]+(n+1)*chtrellis.stateNb]+C[0], B[nstates[1]+(n+1)*chtrellis.stateNb]+C[1]);
00258             sum = std::max(sum, B[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb]);
00259         }
00260         for (m=0;m<chtrellis.stateNb;m++)
00261             B[m+n*chtrellis.stateNb] -= sum;
00262     }
00263 }
00264 
00265     //compute extrinsic_data
00266     extrinsic_data.set_size(N);
00267     for (n=1;n<=N;n++)
00268     {
00269         sum = -INFINITY;
00270         sumbis = -INFINITY;
00271         for (m=0;m<chtrellis.stateNb;m++) //initial state
00272         {
00273             for (k=0;k<2;k++) //input index
00274             {
00275                 nstates[k] = chtrellis.nextState[m+k*chtrellis.stateNb];//determine next states
00276                 C[k] = (k)*apriori_data[n-1]-itpp::sqr(rec_sig[n-1]-chtrellis.output[m+k*chtrellis.stateNb])/(2*sigma2);//compute log of gamma
00277                 buffer = A[m+(n-1)*chtrellis.stateNb]+C[k]+B[nstates[k]+n*chtrellis.stateNb];
00278                 if (k)
00279                     sum = std::max(sum, buffer);//1
00280                 else
00281                     sumbis = std::max(sumbis, buffer);//0
00282             }
00283         }
00284         extrinsic_data[n-1] = (sum-sumbis)-apriori_data[n-1];
00285     }
00286 
00287     //free memory
00288     delete[] chtrellis.output;
00289     delete[] chtrellis.nextState;
00290     delete[] chtrellis.prevState;
00291     delete[] chtrellis.input;
00292     delete[] A;
00293     delete[] B;
00294 }
